name: Mind Corridors: Paroniria
storyline: You open your eyes to some strange events inside your house. After leaving and entering your building's elevator, you realize you are still dreaming, and something won't let you wake up until you face it in the depths of your mind's strangest places. But, is it really all a dream?
summary: A fever-dream-like singleplayer puzzle horror game. Descend to the depths of a sleeping curse, survive every floor and find your way out of the never ending nightmare.
